TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: 为 或 对象的 事件提供数据。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammar As Grammar
public: property System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ Grammar { System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果识别器遇到操作期间的异常<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>属性设置为异常并<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>关联的属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>可能是`false`。
